Crypto Under Siege
Wednesday, May 15, 2024

SEC - Regulation

The recent assault on crypto has some fighting back, but some are running scared too. As the crypto market expands, U.S. agencies like the SEC, DOJ, and Treasury are cracking down on the industry with a regulations blitz, setting their sights on major crypto players.

MORE

Gamestonk II - Dumb Money is Back
Tuesday, May 14, 2024

wall st - Rekt

GameStop meme frenzy went supernova once again, leaving a $1 billion trail of crater-faced short sellers in its wake.

MORE

Pike Finance - Rekt
Friday, May 3, 2024

Pike Finance - REKT

Pike Finance swims in turbulent waters, storage vulnerability nets hackers over $1.9 million in multiple attacks.

MORE

Growing Pains
Wednesday, May 1, 2024

Solana - defi

Solana's relentless pursuit of speed and scalability has transformed the blockchain landscape. But at what cost?

ZKasino - Rekt
Monday, April 22, 2024

ZKasino - REKT - Rugpull

The house always wins and ZKasino hit the jackpot, making off with a $33 million rug over the weekend.

Hedgey Finance - Rekt
Friday, April 19, 2024

Hedgey Finance - REKT

Not a good strategy to hedge your bets. Hedgey Finance rocked by $44.7 million flash loan attack across both the Arbitrum and Ethereum platforms.

Wednesday, April 17, 2024

stable future - defi

What would the world look like if stablecoins were the norm, and blockchain technology was woven into our daily lives?

Grand Base - REKT
Monday, April 15, 2024

Grand Base - REKT

Thieves in the night take advantage of Open House as RWA protocol on Base leaves the front door unlocked. Grand Base slammed in $2m exploit due to a deployer wallet private key leak.

PrismaFi - REKT
Thursday, March 28, 2024

PrismaFi - REKT

PrismaFi fell victim to a flash loan attack, resulting in a loss of 3258 wstETH tokens, valued at approximately $11.6 million.

Munchables - REKT
Wednesday, March 27, 2024

Munchables - REKT

The Blast L2 Big Bang award-winning project Munchables was exploited for $62.5M by a rogue dev. Funds retrieved from dev within a few hours in a rollercoaster ride of a day.

MORE

Curio - REKT
Tuesday, March 26, 2024

Curio - REKT

Curio's MakerDAO-based smart contract on Ethereum was exploited for $16 million, due to a critical vulnerability involving voting power privileges.

MORE

Super Sushi Samurai - REKT
Friday, March 22, 2024

Super Sushi Samurai - REKT

Blast L2-based game Super Sushi Samurai's LP drained $4.8m in contract bug exploit shortly after its launch, and the price dropped 99.9%.
